name: snog
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to kiss and hold a person in a sexual way: I saw them snogging on the back seat of a bus. I've never snogged (with) a man with a beard.
More examplesFewer examplesCan't you two stop snogging for five minutes!My sister and her boyfriend snogged on the sofa all night.I didn't really like him, but I snogged him anyway.
a long, sexual kiss between two people who are holding each other: He caught us having a snog. He'd given up all hope of getting a snog.
More examplesFewer examplesMy school friends were going to parties and having their first snogs.Stick to your own room if you want a snog!They snuggled up for a snog.
